document_data.name: Wrath of Torm
document_data.mainbody: '''''Wrath of Torm''''' was a [[divine]] [[spell]] that granted the caster tremendous power for a short duration.
document_data.Effects: When the spell was cast, the [[cleric]] became illuminated with a white light and grew to 12 feet (3.7 meters) in height. For the spell's duration they appeared to be exceptionally charismatic, they became more skillful in combat, and their attacks inflicted extra harm unto the [[undead]].
document_data.History: The specifications of this spell were inscribed upon one of the metal plates found on the reverse side of the ''[[Veloghon of Vigilance]]''.
document_data.Components: This spell required [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s in order to be cast.
